Html:
Trying to build on Windows Server 2008 R2 but it will not compile.

I am guessing that this is because there are features missing in Windows 2008. What ones are these?

Have tried Desktop Experience but that has had no effect

Thanks,
Ben
what doesn't compile? what error message are you getting?

Apologies for the vagueness; when building my application:

Type or namespace MediaFoundationResampler could not be found. Are you missing a using directive or assembly reference?

Using Naudio 1.6

it's new for NAudio 1.7, shortly to be released
If you know how to use NuGet, you can install the latest beta:
https://www.nuget.org/packages/NAudio
Ah thanks for your help, can't believe I overlooked this!
